patterns: Hello
Hi there
Good morning
responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?

patterns: Goodbye
See you later
Bye
responses: Goodbye! Don't hesitate to return if you have more questions.
See you later! Have a great day.

patterns: Can I have an extension on my project?
I need more time to complete my assignment.
Is it possible to get a deadline extension?
responses: Extensions are not normally granted. What exceptional circumstances require more time?

patterns: I missed class because I was sick.
I had a family emergency and couldn't attend.
My absence was due to a medical appointment.
responses: I understand, but attendance is crucial. How will you make up for the missed classes?

patterns: Is there any way I can improve my grade?
Can I do extra credit to pass the class?
What can I do to get a better grade?
responses: I appreciate your initiative to improve. Present a plan for how you intend to enhance your understanding of the material.

patterns: My performance this semester was impacted by personal issues.
I've been struggling with personal problems that affected my grades.
Due to unforeseen personal issues, I couldn't perform well.
responses: While I sympathize with your situation, academic standards must be maintained. What steps are you taking to address these issues?

patterns: Please, I just need to pass this class to graduate.
Failing this class would ruin my academic career.
I'm on the verge of failing, can't you just pass me?
responses: Passing requires meeting the academic criteria set for this course. Demonstrate your commitment to meeting these standards, and we can discuss further.
